articles.title: 'We can't trust' whether 'the truth' on COVID-19 will be told: Bolt - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
Sky News host Andrew Bolt says he is getting “so suspicious” of the things and information Australians are being told and the “exaggerations” being fed to induce panic in society on COVID-19.
